amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding (by transfer) for the Agricultural Programs, National Institute of Food and Agriculture, Integrated Activities (organic farming) by $5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 97 printed in the Congressional Record to increase funding (by transfer) for the Agricultural Programs, National Institute of Food and Agriculture, Integrated Activities by $5 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 136 - 296 (Roll no. 49).
